db:abstract.db:para: QML frontend for QKeyboardHandler C++ class.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: asteriskPressed(KeyEvent event)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the * key is pressed with the event details being contained within event.

db:section.db:title: backPressed(KeyEvent event)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the back key is pressed with the event details being contained within event.

db:section.db:title: backtabPressed(KeyEvent event)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the backtab key is pressed with the event details being contained within event.

db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the call key is pressed with the event details being contained within event.

db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the cancel key is pressed with the event details being contained within event.
